=== What is a 'Release Party' ? ===
A release party is a great way to celebrate Ubuntu, have a fun evening and meet interesting people.<<BR>>
An event to socialize with other area enthusiasts.<<BR>><<BR>>
Food (NOMS) <nowiki>[[http://www.thefreedictionary.com/Dutch+treat |(Dutch Treat)]]</nowiki> <<BR>>

Minors are welcome, but are encouraged to bring a Parent or Guardian to accompany them throughout the event.
